tool.name: visual_offset
tool.description: Adjust the 3D visual offset for stereoscopic display alignment.

parameters.name: pixels
parameters.description: Offset in pixels (positive or negative)

tool.name: hud_mode
tool.description: Switch the HUD display mode. Available modes: default, environmental, armor.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The HUD mode to switch to

tool.description: Control the helmet faceplate/visor. Open or close the faceplate.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Whether to open or close the faceplate

tool.description: Set the audio volume level for TTS and music playback.

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: Volume level from 0 (silent) to 100 (maximum)

tool.description: Get the current date. Returns today's date formatted for the user.
Get the current time. Returns the current local time.

tool.name: llm_status
tool.description: Get information about the current LLM configuration. Returns whether using local or cloud LLM and the model name.
Analyze what the camera sees. Takes a photo and describes the scene, identifies objects, reads text, or answers questions about the view.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: What to look for or question about the view (e.g., 'what do you see?', 'read the text', 'is anyone there?')

tool.description: Control music playback. Can play, pause, stop, skip tracks, or play a specific song/artist.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The playback action

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Song/artist name to play (for 'play' action)

tool.description: Control the voice amplifier/PA system for projecting voice through external speakers.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Whether to enable or disable voice amplification

tool.description: Shutdown or restart the system. Only use when explicitly requested.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The shutdown action

tool.name: reset_conversation
tool.description: Clear the conversation history and start fresh. Use when the user wants to change topics completely or start a new conversation.
Get weather forecast. If no location specified, uses the user's default location. If no time specified, defaults to today.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Forecast period: 'today' for current conditions, 'tomorrow' for next day, 'week' for 7-day forecast

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: City and state/country (e.g., 'Atlanta, Georgia'). Optional - uses user's default if not specified.

tool.description: Search the web for information. Returns relevant search results that can be used to answer questions about current events, facts, etc.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Search category: 'web' for general search, 'news' for current events, 'science' for scientific topics, 'social' for social media posts and discussions

tool.description: Perform calculations: evaluate math expressions, convert units, convert number bases, or generate random numbers.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The type of calculation to perform

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: For 'evaluate': math expression (e.g., 'sqrt(144) + 2^8'). For 'convert': unit conversion (e.g., '5 miles to km'). For 'base': number base conversion (e.g., '255 to hex'). For 'random': range (e.g., '1 to 100').

tool.description: Fetch and extract readable content from a URL. Returns the main text content of a webpage.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to fetch (must start with http:// or https://)

tool.description: Control SmartThings smart home devices. Can list devices, check status, and control lights, switches, locks, and thermostats.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to perform

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: Device name (required for all actions except 'list')

parameters.name: setting
parameters.description: Value for the action (brightness: 0-100, color: hex code, temperature: degrees)

tools._comment: Meta-tools that aggregate multiple devices or have special handling

hud_control.description: Control HUD (Heads-Up Display) elements. Enable or disable display overlays like the armor display, minimap, object detection, or info panel.

parameters.name: element
parameters.description: The HUD element to control

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Whether to show or hide the element

switch_llm.description: Switch between local and cloud LLM, or change the cloud provider. Use 'local' to use the local LLM server, 'cloud' to use cloud AI, or specify a provider name like 'openai' or 'claude'.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The LLM target to switch to

recording.description: Control video recording and streaming. Start or stop recording, streaming, or both simultaneously.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: What to control

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Whether to start or stop

audio_device.description: Switch audio input or output devices.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of audio device to change

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: Device name (e.g., 'microphone', 'headphones', 'speakers')
